title: Split an Order for Partial Shipment
description: An order contains two items, but one is on backorder. The customer wants the in-stock item to ship now.

tasks.description: Find the order and confirm one item is in stock and the other is on backorder.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the inventory status of the line items.

tasks.description: Split the order line for the in-stock item into a new sales order.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new order is created for the available item, and the original order is updated to only contain the backordered item.

tasks.description: Release the new order to the warehouse for immediate shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new order is sent to the WMS for fulfillment.
